timeline.bodyText: I think it's a good time to move this .each (prototypejs) to a .forEach (standard JS). Needs manual testing though.
timeline.author: fqueiruga

timeline.author: fqueiruga

timeline.bodyText: not sure how this would work. @EstherAF  was looking into tables lately and found some issues with this 1px width. Care to chime in?
timeline.author: fqueiruga

replies.bodyText:
The problem I found doesn't affect here, I think, so this looks good to me.
My problem was setting a width: 1% in a cell when the table has a width: auto. In that situation, the table width auto is calculated as 100%, so the table doesn't fit the content anymore, but expands to 100%.
replies.author: EstherAF
